¶ But <WG235> in <WG1722> those <WG1565> days <WG2250> , after <WG3326> that <WG1565> tribulation <WG2347> , the sun <WG2246> shall be darkened <WG4654> , and <WG2532> the moon <WG4582> shall <WG1325> not <WG3756> give <WG1325> her <WG846> light <WG5338> ,
